text: Jilani (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ): “Chisimu une ngun’jamuka chindu chimpepe: Chakuti n’jiime ligongo lya Allah, ŵaŵili-ŵaŵili ni jumo-jumo, kaneka ni nchetelele; (tinyyione yanti) n’jenuju (Muhammadi ﷺ) nganakola masoka, nganijuŵa jwalakwe ikaŵeje nkuntetela jwenu, nkaniyiyiche ilagasyo yaukali nnope.”
